member.summary: Destroys a ProEssentials control. Call PEdestroy for every instance of calling PEcreate.

member.summary: Call this function to rebuild the control's image after adjusting properties.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.Api.PEchangeresourcesW(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes resource DLL, changes menus, dialogs, date strings to specifie file. See PeFunction.ChangeResources .NET call. nNewCharSet is new CharSet setting. bUpdateCharSet set non-zero causes all controls in memory to change their CharSet setting. bUpdateAllCharts set non-zero causes all controls in memory to reinitialize and loading new menus and dialogs.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TwoDimensionalFloatArray.BindData(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads data from a DataReader or DataView source. This method does not clear existing data or alter Data.Subsets and Data.Points. This method will fill this array with data upto an amount defined by Data.Subsets and Data.Points. Data is loaded at indices starting with startingSubsetIndex and startingPointIndex. Multiple subsets of data are read in and allocated by their sequence in column. The return value is the number of records set.

member.summary: If desired, set a ToolTip to associate with this image map item.

member.summary: If desired, provide an attribute string which will be appended to this image map item.

member.summary: Set to false to prevent this individual map item from being rendered.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.EventArg.ImageMapEventArgs.HotSpotType
member.summary: Gets the type of hot spot related to this hot spot/map item.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.EventArg.ImageMapEventArgs.Data1
member.summary: For HotSpotType types DataPoint and Table, Data1 and Data2 are the respecive Subset and Point index. You can determine data value with PeData.Y(Data1, Data2). For types MultiSubTitle and MultiBottomTitle, Data1 is title index, Data2 = 0-left, 1-center, 2-right. For types TableAnnotation Data1 and Data2 are the row and column index. For GridNumber types, Data1 is axis index when using MultiAxesSubsets, use Data2 to get UserInterface.HotSpot.GridNumber[Data2] to determine grid number value. For YAxisLabel and YAxis types, Data1 is axis index, Data2=0-left, 1=right. For XAxisLabel and XAxis types, Data1 = 0-bottom, 1=top. All graph, line, and axis annotation types use Data1 to hold annotation index.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.EventArg.ImageMapEventArgs.Data2
member.summary: For HotSpotType types DataPoint and Table, Data1 and Data2 are the respecive Subset and Point index. You can determine data value with PeData.Y(Data1, Data2). For types MultiSubTitle and MultiBottomTitle, Data1 is title index, Data2 = 0-left, 1-center, 2-right. For types TableAnnotation Data1 and Data2 are the row and column index. For GridNumber types, Data1 is axis index when using MultiAxesSubsets, use Data2 to get UserInterface.HotSpot.GridNumber[Data2] to determine grid number value. For YAxisLabel and YAxis types, Data1 is axis index, Data2=0-left, 1=right. For XAxisLabel and XAxis types, Data1 = 0-bottom, 1=top. All graph, line, and axis annotation types use Data1 to hold annotation index.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.ExportImageDpi
member.summary: Gets or Sets the DotsPerInch info when exporting an image by calling a function or using built-in export dialog. If zero, no DPI information is embedded.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.HideExportImageDpi
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the ImageExportDpi setting is shown within the ProEssentials export dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.ExportImageLargeFont
member.summary: When exporting a chart as a high resolution image (larger than 2000 pixels wide or tall,) setting this property True will use alternate fixed font sizing logic producing larger fonts. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.EmfBitmapGradients
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether exported enhanced metafiles from the built-in export dialog will include background bitmaps and gradients. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.EmfType
member.summary: Gets or Sets the type of enhanced metafile created when exported from built-in export dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.EmfDC
member.summary: Gets or Sets the target Device Context used when exporting enhanced metafiles from the built-in export dialog. DisplayDpiAdjusted uses the display DC but then manipulates the EMF header to simulate a higher DPI.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.DpiX
member.summary: Gets or Sets the target Dots-Per-Inch DPI width for exported metafiles. When using the FixedFonts feature, and sending a prepared metafile directly to printer via PlayMetafile, then generally set this property to the target printer's DPI.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ImageFunctionItems.DpiY
member.summary: Gets or Sets the target Dots-Per-Inch DPI width for exported metafiles. When using the FixedFonts feature, and sending a prepared metafile directly to printer via PlayMetafile, then generally set this property to the target printer's DPI.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.FunctionItems.PartialReinitializeResetImage
member.summary: Similar to ReinitializeAndResetImage, this version is faster as it does not determine min/max and other axis parameters. Only use this function if adjusting non-data related properties.

member.summary: Call this function to rebuild the control's image after adjusting properties. Generally use ReinitializeResetImage or PartialReinitializeResetImage which includes this call.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.FunctionItems.GetRectGraph

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.FunctionItems.SaveObjectToFile(System.String)

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.FunctionItems.LoadObjectFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: This function restores the object from a binary file named by fileName. The file loaded must have been created with the SaveObjectToFile function for the same type of object.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.FunctionItems.LoadFromURL(System.String)

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.FunctionItems.LoadObjectFromStream(System.IO.MemoryStream)

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphFunctionItems.GetSpringDayLight
member.summary: Called to get spring day light settings. Month is 1 through 12 for month of the spring day light threshold. Day is a number between (1-5) representing the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th Sunday in the month. Hour is the hour 0 through 23 of threshold. The default values are Month = 4 (April), Day = 1 (1st Sunday), Hour = 2 (2 am).

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphFunctionItems.SetSpringDayLight(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called to set spring day light settings. Month is 1 through 12 for month of the spring day light threshold. Day is a number between (1-5) representing the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th Sunday in the month. Hour is the hour 0 through 23 of threshold. The default values are Month = 4 (April), Day = 1 (1st Sunday), Hour = 2 (2 am).

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphFunctionItems.SetSpringDayLight(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called to set spring day light settings. Month is 1 through 12 for month of the spring day light threshold. Day is a number between (1-5) representing the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th WeekDay in the month. Hour is the hour 0 through 23 of threshold. WeekDay is 0=Sun, 1=Mon, 2=Tue, etc The default values are Month = 4 (April), Day = 1 (1st Sunday), Hour = 2 (2 am), WeekDay = 0 (sunday).

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphFunctionItems.GetFallDayLight
member.summary: Called to get fall day light settings. Month is 1 through 12 for month of the spring day light threshold. Day is a number between (1-5) representing the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th Sunday in the month. Hour is the hour 0 through 23 of threshold. The default values are Month = 10 (October), Day = 5 (5th/last Sunday), Hour = 2 (2 am).

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphFunctionItems.SetFallDayLight(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called to set fall day light settings. Month is 1 through 12 for month of the spring day light threshold. Day is a number between (1-5) representing the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th Sunday in the month. Hour is the hour 0 through 23 of threshold. The default values are Month = 10 (October), Day = 5 (5th/last Sunday), Hour = 2 (2 am).

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphFunctionItems.SetFallDayLight(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called to set fall day light settings. Month is 1 through 12 for month of the spring day light threshold. Day is a number between (1-5) representing the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th WeekDay in the month. Hour is the hour 0 through 23 of threshold. WeekDay is 0=Sun, 1=Mon, 2=Tue, etc The default values are Month = 10 (October), Day = 5 (5th/last Sunday), Hour = 2 (2 am), WeekDay = 0 (sunday).

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.DeskBackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets and Sets the Image used as background image for entire control. This property is only enabled if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.Desk = Empty, and Color.DeskBmpStyle is non-zero. This property or Color.DeskBmpFilename can be used to assign a bitmap. If both are assigned, this property takes precedence.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphBackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets and Sets the Image used behind the grid or chart area. This property is only enabled if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.GraphBackground = Empty, and Color.GraphBmpStyle is non-zero. This property or Color.GraphBmpFilename can be used to assign a bitmap. If both are assigned, this property takes precedence.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.SubsetColors
member.summary: Gets or Sets colors used to identify subsets. Only used if Color.ViewingStyle = Color.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.SubsetShades
member.summary: Gets or Sets shaded colors used to identify subsets when Color.ViewingStyle is set to monochrome. Only bars, areas, pie slices, and other large filled areas are shaded. Points and Lines are always black in a monochrome viewing style.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.Mono
member.summary: Gets or Sets monochrome properties used when ViewingStyle is set to monochrome.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.ViewingStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the image is color or monochrome.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.QuickStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current predefined color configuation. There are two sets of configurations controlled via BitmapGradientMode.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.BitmapGradientMode
member.summary: Gets or Sets bitmap mode. TRUE to use Bitmap/Gradients quick style, FALSE to use color quick styles.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphForeground
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of grid area's bounding box and grid lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphBackground
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of grid area's background.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.Desk
member.summary: Gets or Sets color used as the background color behind titles and labels.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.Text
member.summary: Gets or Sets color used as the foreground color for main titles and labels.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.Shadow
member.summary: If BorderTypes property is set to drop-shadow, this property controls color of drop-shadow when BitmapGradientMode is FALSE.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.DeskGradientStart
member.summary: Gets or Sets starting gradient color for desk area. Desk gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.Desk = Empty, and Color.DeskGradientStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.DeskGradientEnd
member.summary: Gets or Sets ending gradient color for desk area. Desk gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.Desk = Empty, and Color.DeskGradientStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.DeskGradientStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the style of desk gradient. Desk gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, and Color.Desk = Empty.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.DeskBmpStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the style of desk bitmap. Desk bitmaps are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.Desk = Empty, and Color.DeskBmpFilename is set.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.DeskBmpFilename
member.summary: Gets or Sets filename used for the desk bitmap. Desk bitmaps are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.DeskBackColor = Empty, and Color.DeskBmpStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphGradientStart
member.summary: Gets or Sets starting gradient color for charting area. Graph gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.GraphBackColor = Empty, and Color.GraphGradientStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphGradientEnd
member.summary: Gets or Sets ending gradient color for charting area. Graph gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.GraphBackColor = Empty, and Color.GraphGradientStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphGradientStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the style of graph gradient. Graph gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, and Color.GraphBackColor = Empty.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphBmpStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the style of charting area bitmap. Graph bitmaps are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.GraphBackColor = Empty, and Color.GraphBmpFilename is set.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.GraphBmpFilename
member.summary: Gets or Sets filename used for the charting area bitmap. Graph bitmaps are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.GraphBackColor = Empty, and Color.GraphBmpStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.PngIsTransparent
member.summary: When any ProEssentials PNG export feature is utilized, this property controls whether the output includes the transparent color defined by Color.PngTransparentColor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.PngTransparentColor
member.summary: When any ProEssentials PNG export feature is utilized, this property controls the RGB color considered transparent if Color.PngIsTransparent is True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.PngIsInterlaced
member.summary: When any ProEssentials PNG export feature is utilized, this property controls whether the output is interlaced.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ColorItems.JpgQuality
member.summary: Gets and Sets the quality of JPEG export. Values range from 1 to 100 where 100 represents maximum quality. This quality setting effects any JPEG export features within the ProEssentials product.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.SubsetGradientStartColors
member.summary: Default is empty, but can be used to define per subset gradient start colors. Only used if gradients are defined via AreaGradientStyle, BarGradientStyle, SplineGradientStyle.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.PointColors
member.summary: Gets or Sets color on a per data point basis. To change point color per subset, use Plot.SubsetColors. If you use this property, you need to define color for all points unless Plot.SubsetForPointColors is used to designated which subsets use this property and which use the default Plot.SubsetColors property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.GridLineColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of all grid lines when GridBold=false. Default is 1, meaning use a smart alpha of background for color, but if defined will show in any color.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.GridLineAlpha
member.summary: Gets or Sets alpha value for grid lines when GridBold=False and GridLineColor=1. Default=55. Will simulate an alpha if RenderEngine not GdiPlus and BitmapGradientMode=false. Smaller number = lines less noticable.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.GridBold
member.summary: Set True to show grid colors as legacy style, no alpha via GridLineAlpha.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.YAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of y axis grid numbers and label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.XAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of x axis grid numbers / pointlabels and axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.AxisForeColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of y axis forecolor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphColorItems.AxisBackColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of y axis backcolor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.GridBands
member.summary: True to show grid with banding effect between major grid lines. See GridBandsAlpha and GridBandsColor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.GridBandsColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of grid bands. Default is Empty, meaning use a smart alpha of background for color, but if defined will show in any color.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.GridBandsAlpha
member.summary: Gets or Sets alpha value for grid bands when GridBandsColor=Empty. Default=10. Will simulate an alpha if RenderEngine not GdiPlus and BitmapGradientMode=false. Smaller number = lines less noticable.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.BarBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of border of bar graphics. Set to -1 to disable bar border color for 2d bars.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.Mono
member.summary: Gets or Sets monochrome properties used when ViewingStyle is set to monochrome.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.RYAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of right y axis grid numbers and label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TickColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of minor grid tick marks.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.HatchBackColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of the background used for all points/bars/pie slices when Plot.SubsetHatch is set.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableForeground
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of table area's bounding box and text.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableBackground
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of table area's background.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableGradientStart
member.summary: Gets or Sets starting gradient color for table area. Table gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.TableBackColor = Empty, and Color.TableGradientStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableGradientEnd
member.summary: Gets or Sets ending gradient color for table area. Table gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.TableBackColor = Empty, and Color.TableGradientStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableGradientStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the style of table gradient. Table gradients are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, and Color.TableBackColor = Color.Tranparent.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableBmpStyle
member.summary: Gets or Sets the style of table area bitmap. Table bitmaps are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.TableBackColor = Empty, and Color.TableBmpFilename is set.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableBmpFilename
member.summary: Gets or Sets filename used for the table area bitmap. Table bitmaps are enabled only if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.TableBackColor = Empty, and Color.TableBmpStyle is non-zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphColorItems.TableBackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets and Sets the Image used behind the graph's built in table. This property is only enabled if Color.BitmapGradientMode is True, Color.TableBackground = 1, and Color.TablehBmpStyle is non-zero. This property or Color.TableBmpFilename can be used to assign a bitmap. If both are assigned, this property takes precedence.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphColorItems.GridBands
member.summary: True to show grid with banding effect between major grid lines. See GridBandsAlpha and GridBandsColor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphColorItems.GridBandsColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of grid bands. Default is Empty, meaning use a smart alpha of background for color, but if defined will show in any color.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphColorItems.GridBandsAlpha
member.summary: Gets or Sets alpha value for grid bands when GridBandsColor=Empty. Default=10. Will simulate an alpha if RenderEngine not GdiPlus and BitmapGradientMode=false. Smaller number = lines less noticable.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphColorItems.BarBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of border of bar graphics. Set to -1 to disable bar border color for 2d bars.

member.summary: Gets or Sets color of right y axis grid numbers and label.

member.summary: Gets or Sets color of top x axis grid numbers and axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphColorItems.BarBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of border of bar graphics. Set to -1 to disable bar border color for 2d bars.

member.summary: Gets or Sets color of z axis grid numbers and axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphColorItems.XZBackColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets background color of bottom x-z plane. Set to a value of "1" for transparency.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphColorItems.YBackColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets background color of top y axis planes. Set to a value of "1" for transparency.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.SubsetLabels
member.summary: Gets or Sets strings used to identify subsets.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.PointLabels
member.summary: Gets or Sets strings used to identify points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.MultiSubTitles
member.summary: Gets or Sets strings used to identify multiple sub titles. Indices 0 through 9 allow for 10 extra sub titles. Each subtitle has a potential left, centered, and right justified component delimited with the pipe character ‘|’.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.MultiBottomTitles
member.summary: Gets or Sets strings used to identify multiple bottom sub titles. Indices 0 through 9 allow for 10 extra sub titles. Each subtitle has a potential left, centered, and right justified component delimited with the pipe character ‘|’.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.WideCharToMultiByte
member.summary: To support multi-byte strings when RenderEngine is set to GDI(0) and within exported metafiles, WideCharToMultiByte must be set True and CodePage and CharSet set appropriately.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.CodePage
member.summary: To support multi-byte strings when RenderEngine is set to GDI(0) and within exported metafiles, WideCharToMultiByte must be set True and CodePage and CharSet set appropriately.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.CharSet
member.summary: To support multi-byte strings when RenderEngine is set to GDI(0) and within exported metafiles, WideCharToMultiByte must be set True and CodePage and CharSet set appropriately.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.MainTitle
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's main title. Pipe symbols can be used to separate into 3 regions, left, middle, and right.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.SubTitle
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's sub title. Pipe symbols can be used to separate into 3 regions, left, middle, and right.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.TruncateTitles
member.summary: Gets or Sets if MainTitle and SubTitle text can be truncated to fit.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.TextShadows
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether text will include a drop-shadow effect.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TextItems.DarkTextInset
member.summary: If false, dark text is never shadowed. If true, dark text is drawn with a 3D inset effect rather than shadowed.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphTextItems.XAxisLabel
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's x axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphTextItems.YAxisLabel
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's y axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphTextItems.TruncateYAxisLabels
member.summary: Gets or Sets if YAxisLabels can be truncated to fit.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphTextItems.TruncateXAxisLabels
member.summary: Gets or Sets if XAxisLabels can be truncated to fit.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphTextItems.RYAxisLabel
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's right y axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphTextItems.PointLabelRows
member.summary: Set to 2 or larger to form multi-line point labels. PointLabels will need to include pipe symbol '|' delimiters to signify where line-feeds exist within the point label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphTextItems.DataPointLabels
member.summary: This property identifies data labels which will be placed next to data points when Plot.Option.DataLabels equals DataPointLabels and Plot.Option.GraphDataLabels equals True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphTextItems.ContourLabels
member.summary: If items are defined in this property and Legend.ContourStyle is True, then this property allows for text to be associated with a color. You can assign a label per color but if using many colors, possibly define a few labels at strategic colors to prevent overlapping.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphTextItems.RYAxisLabel
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's right y axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphTextItems.TXAxisLabel
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's top x axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphTextItems.DataPointLabels
member.summary: This property identifies data labels which will be placed next to data points when Plot.Option.DataLabels equals DataPointLabels and Plot.Option.GraphDataLabels equals True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphTextItems.ContourLabels
member.summary: If items are defined in this property and Legend.ContourStyle is True, then this property allows for text to be associated with a color. You can assign a label per color but if using many colors, possibly define a few labels at strategic colors to prevent overlapping.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphTextItems.ZAxisLabel
member.summary: Gets or Sets text used as chart's z axis label.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphTextItems.DataPointLabels
member.summary: This property identifies data labels which will be placed next to data points when Plot.Option.DataLabels equals DataPointLabels and Plot.Option.GraphDataLabels equals True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphTextItems.RoseCenterLabel
member.summary: Only used when Plot.SmithChart is set to Rose Gets and Sets the label in center of rose plot. You can add one '|' pipe delimiter to form two lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PCTextItems.ManualSliceLabelLength
member.summary: Set to a number of characters which is larger than any slice label within this and other charts. Use this property to get multiple pie charts with the same radius.

member.summary: This property will enable individual axes to be sized by using the mouse and clicking and dragging the lower axis of a Multi-Axes section. The mouse displays a cursor defined by Cursor.SizeNS while dragging.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.MenuUIItems.CustomMenu
member.summary: This property controls the visibility of custom menu items. Custom menus are created with the UI.Menu.CustomMenuText property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.MenuUIItems.CustomMenuState
member.summary: This property controls the checked state of custom menu items. For single string menu items, submenu index is set to zero. For popup menus, submenu index is set to 1 through nth item in sub menu. Custom menus are created with the UI.Menu.CustomMenuText property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.MenuUIItems.CustomMenuLocation
member.summary: This property controls the location of custom menu items. Custom menus are created with the UI.Menu.CustomMenuText property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.MenuUIItems.CustomMenuText
member.summary: This property creates custom menu items by providing their text. For simple string menu items, provide one string with no delimiters (no pipe symbols '|'). To produce a popup menu, provide a string with 2 or more delimiters ('|') which divide text into multiple menu text items. The first delimited portion will be the main menu item text and subsequent text portions will be used to create the sub-menu popop items. To create a separator, set text to '|'.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.MenuUIItems.Show
member.summary: Gets or Sets ability to access popup menu. Right clicking control or pressing 'q' invokes menu.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.MenuUIItems.MaxDataPrecision
member.summary: This property controls the maximum number of decimal positions that the user can select from either the customization dialog or popup menu. Possible values are: 3 through 7.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ScrollbarUIItems.SBCode
member.summary: Read Only, gets the most recent scrollbar code cooresponding to latest scroll event. Used within PreHScroll and PreVScroll events. If the developer wants to prevent the future scroll event, set this property to -1. If the developer wants to alter the future scrollbar position, set this property to LineUp or LineDown and set SBPos to a value 1 less or 1 more so that after the event, the position is as desired.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ScrollbarUIItems.SBPos
member.summary: Read Only, gets the most recent scrollbar position cooresponding to latest scroll event. Used with PreHScroll and PreVScroll events.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ScrollbarUIItems.MouseWheelFunction
member.summary: Gets or Sets the action of the MouseWheel.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.DisableThumbTracking
member.summary: Set true to disable new logic that performs immediate chart updates while dragging scrollbars.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.MouseDraggingX
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user can click, grab and drag the chart via the mouse in horizontal direction. The horizontal scrollbar must be visible for this feature to function.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.MouseDraggingY
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user can click, grab and drag the chart via the mouse in vertical direction. The vertical scrollbar must be visible for this feature to function.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingSubsets
member.summary: Gets or Sets the quantity of subsets that get viewed simultaneously, enabling a vertical scrollbar to access other subsets.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.CursorPageAmount
member.summary: Gets or Sets the increment/decrement of the cursor position when the user presses the Page-Up/Page-Down keys.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.HorzScrollPos
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current horizontal scrollbar position. NOTE: only set this property after the control is initialized via one of the Functions.Reinitialize.. functions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.VertScrollPos
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current vertical scrollbar position. NOTE: only set this property after the control is initialized via one of the Functions.Reinitialize.. functions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingVertZoom
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether a vertical scrollbar will be made available upon zooming. The scrollbar will allow the user to pan up and down to view all of the graph’s data. This feature is NOT compatible with the use of Grid.Configure.MultiAxesSubsets.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingScaleControl
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether y axes change their min and max values to match the currently viewed subsets and or points, or as user zooms and pans the chart.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphScrollbarUIItems.PointsToGraph
member.summary: Gets or Sets the quantity of points that get viewed simultaneously, enabling a horizontal scrollbar to access other points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphScrollbarUIItems.PointsToGraphInit
member.summary: If PointsToGraph is non-zero, Gets or Sets whether the first or last points are initially shown.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingRange
member.summary: Read Only after calling Function.ReinitializeResetImage. Use this property to get the extents of the current horizontal scrolling range.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingFactor
member.summary: Read Only after calling Function.ReinitializeResetImage. When Data.Points is more than 32000 then scrolling 1 position on the horizontal scrollbar actually moves the chart by more than one point index. The quantity of points scrolled in one scrollbar position is read from this property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphScrollbarUIItems.HScrollStyle
member.summary: The property defaults to ScrollingPointLabels which enables a new scrolling style for Graph objects. In this new style, if there is no table shown, the PointLabels scroll/move with the data.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingHorzZoom
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether a horizontal scrollbar will be made available upon zooming. The scrollbar will allow the user to pan left and right to view all of the graph’s data.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphScrollbarUIItems.MouseDraggingX
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user can click, grab and drag the chart via the mouse in horizontal direction. The horizontal scrollbar must be visible for this feature to function.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphScrollbarUIItems.MouseDraggingY
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user can click, grab and drag the chart via the mouse in vertical direction. The vertical scrollbar must be visible for this feature to function.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphScrollbarUIItems.HorzScrollBar
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether a horizontal scrollbar will be visible. The horizontal scroll bar controls the rotation angle of image. Scrollbar.DegreeOfRotation programmatically controls this angle.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphScrollbarUIItems.VertScrollBar
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether a vertical scrollbar will be visible. The vertical scroll bar controls the viewing height of image. Scrollbar.ViewingHeight programmatically controls this scroll bar position.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphScrollbarUIItems.DegreeOfRotation
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current horizontal scroll bar position (0 - 359 degrees) controlling horizontal image rotation. NOTE: Only set this property after the control is initialized via one of the Functions.Reinitialize.. functions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphScrollbarUIItems.ViewingHeight
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current vertical scroll bar position controlling vertical image rotation. Possible values range from 50 through –50. Where 50 is looking above 3d image. NOTE: Only set this property after the control is initialized via one of the Functions.Reinitialize.. functions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphScrollbarUIItems.ScrollingSubsets
member.summary: Gets or Sets the quantity of subsets that get viewed simultaneously, enabling a vertical scrollbar to access other subsets.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphScrollbarUIItems.VertScrollPos
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current vertical scrollbar position. NOTE: only set this property after the control is initialized via one of the Functions.Reinitialize.. functions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PCScrollbarUIItems.DisableThumbTracking
member.summary: Set true to disable new logic that performs immediate chart updates while dragging scrollbars.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PCScrollbarUIItems.VertScrollPos
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current vertical scrollbar position. NOTE: only set this property after the control is initialized via one of the Functions.Reinitialize.. functions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.CursorUIItems.Hand
member.summary: Gets or Sets the mouse's cursor style over hot spots. Setting to 0 uses default hand style. Set to alternate values defined in ProEssentials.Enums.MouseCursorStyles. Also set to any operating system based cursor handle like Cursor.Handle.ToInt32().

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.CursorUIItems.LastMouseMove
member.summary: Gets the mouse's most recent mouse move coordinates.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.CursorUIItems.ProcessingMouseMove
member.summary: Read only. Read within MouseMove event to see if any built-in ProEssentials based logic is currently also processing the mousemove event. This prevents conflict in custom versus built-in user interaction type logic.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.HourGlassThreshold
member.summary: Gets or Sets the data point quantity threshold when the mouse cursor changes to an hour-glass while building image like Cursor.Handle.ToInt32().

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or Sets the mouse's cursor style while zooming. Setting to 0 uses default magnifying glass style. Set to alternate values defined in ProEssentials.Enums.MouseCursorStyles. Also set to any operating system based cursor handle like Cursor.Handle.ToInt32().

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.NoDrop
member.summary: Gets or Sets the mouse's cursor style while zooming and zoom not possible. Setting to 0 uses default no-drop style. Set to alternate values defined in ProEssentials.Enums.MouseCursorStyles. Also set to any operating system based cursor handle like Cursor.Handle.ToInt32().

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.Mode
member.summary: Gets or Sets cursor style. Cursor styles POINT, DATACROSS, DATASQUARE, and FLOATINGY are all designed to give either a point index the focus or an individual data point the focus.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.Subset
member.summary: Gets or Sets the zero-based index of the subset that has the cursor’s focus. If setting this property, set Cursor.Point after this property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.Point
member.summary: Gets or Sets the zero-based index of the point that has the cursor’s focus. If setting this property, set Cursor.Subset before this property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.PromptStyle
member.summary: If Cursor.PromptTracking is true, Gets or Sets the style of coordinate prompting when moving the mouse or cursor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.PromptTracking
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the graph continuously prompts the user of the data point value directly under the mouse cursor. See also: Cursor.PromptStyle

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.PromptLocation
member.summary: If Cursor.PromptTracking is true, Gets or Sets the location of coordinate prompting when moving the mouse or cursor.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphCursorUIItems.MouseCursorControl
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the user can use the mouse to move the cursor's focus to a data point clicked. See also: Cursor.Mode

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphCursorUIItems.SizeNS
member.summary: Gets or Sets the mouse's cursor style while changing axis size via UI.Allow.MultiAxesSizing property. Setting to 0 uses default North South sizing style. Set to alternate values defined in ProEssentials.Enums.MouseCursorStyles. Also set to any operating system based cursor handle like Cursor.Handle.ToInt32().

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphCursorUIItems.SizeNS
member.summary: Gets or Sets the mouse's cursor style while changing axis size via UI.Allow.MultiAxesSizing property. Setting to 0 uses default North South sizing style. Set to alternate values defined in ProEssentials.Enums.MouseCursorStyles. Also set to any operating system based cursor handle.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphCursorUIItems.Mode
member.summary: Gets or Sets cursor style.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.AllowJpegExport
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the Jpeg image format is shown within the ProEssentials Export Dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.AllowSvgExport
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the SVG image format is shown within the ProEssentials Export Dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.AllowEmfExport
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the EMF image format is shown within the ProEssentials Export Dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.AllowWmfExport
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the WMF image format is shown within the ProEssentials Export Dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.ExportImageDpi
member.summary: Gets or Sets the DotsPerInch info when exporting an image by calling a function or using built-in export dialog. If zero, no DPI information is embedded.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.HideExportImageDpi
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the ExportImageDpi setting is shown within the ProEssentials export dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.EmfBitmapGradients
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether exported enhanced metafiles from the built-in export dialog will include background bitmaps and gradients. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.EmfType
member.summary: Gets or Sets the type of enhanced metafile created when exported from built-in export dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.EmfDC
member.summary: Gets or Sets the target Device Context used when exporting enhanced metafiles from the built-in export dialog. DisplayDpiAdjusted uses the display DC but then manipulates the EMF header to simulate a higher DPI.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.ExportImageLargeFont
member.summary: When exporting a chart as a high resolution image (larger than 2000 pixels wide or tall,) setting this property True will use alternate fixed font sizing logic producing larger fonts. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.PrintDpi
member.summary: Gets or Sets the target DotsPerInch when printing. If zero, the chart image is sent via the actual graphic primitives. If non zero, the chart image is prepared as a bitmap and this bitmap is sent to the printer.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.HidePrintDpi
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the PrintDpi setting is shown within the ProEssentials print dialog. ///

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.PrintTechnology
member.summary: Gets or Sets a property that controls how printing is sent to the printer when PrintDpi is non-zero, as GDI (prepares as BMP and StretchBlts to printer) or GDIPLUS (prepares as PNG.)

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.DefOrientation
member.summary: Gets or Sets default orientation of the printer paper when printing.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.PrintStyleControl
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the user has access to selecting monochrome or color printing from the built-in print dialog. Also controls whether dialog defaults to monochrome output.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.Page1
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user has access to the first General property page within customization dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.Page2
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user has access to the second property page within customization dialog. Pego, Pesgo, and Pepso objects name the second property page 'Plot'. Pepco objects name the second property page "Slices". Pe3do objects name the second property page "More".

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.Color
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user has access to the 'Color' property page within customization dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.Font
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user has access to the 'Font' property page within customization dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.Style
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether user has access to the 'Style' property page within customization dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.MaxDataPrecision
member.summary: This property controls the maximum number of decimal positions that the user can select from either the customization dialog or popup menu. Possible values are: 3 through 7.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.Modal
member.summary: This property controls how all built-in dialogs are launched, modal, or modeless. Dialogs are modeless by default unless Dialog.Modal is set to TRUE. A modal dialog must be closed before accessing the rest of the application. If using a modeless dialog, this lets the user shift the focus from the dialog to the application without closing the dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.ModelessOnTop
member.summary: Set this property to TRUE for modeless dialogs to always be on top of all other open windows.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.DialogUIItems.ModelessAutoClose
member.summary: This property controls how the modeless dialogs are closed. TRUE = Modeless dialogs will close if focus is lost. FALSE = Modeless dialogs will close only if Ok or Cancel is selected.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the default destination button selected in the export dialog.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ZoomGridItems.MinAxis
member.summary: Generally read in response to a ZoomIn event when multiple y axes are implemented. Gets and Sets zoomed min axis index.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ZoomGridItems.MaxAxis
member.summary: Generally read in response to a ZoomIn event when multiple y axes are implemented. Gets and Sets zoomed max axis index.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphZoomGridItems.MinTX
member.summary: Generally read in response to a ZoomIn event. Gets and Sets zoomed min top X axis value.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphZoomGridItems.MaxTX
member.summary: Generally read in response to a ZoomIn event. Gets and Sets zoomed max top X axis value.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.Mode
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the chart is currently zoomed.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.Limited
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether polar/smith charts can be zoomed repeatedly (false, default) or limited (true) to one zoom.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.MaxFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets maxium amount of zoom. Default and recommended setting equals 10000 (or logical size of chart can be 10000 times size of currently zoomed selection rectangle.)

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.WorkingFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets current zoom factor or zoom level. Defined as ratio of logical size of chart compared to size of currently zoomed selection rectangle.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.OffsetPixelX
member.summary: Gets or sets currently zoomed horizontal pixel offset within the logical coordinates defining virtual size/location of chart. The logical size/location of zoomed chart is retrieved with PeFunction.GetRectAxis. GetRectGraph defines size/location of viewport in screen coordinates which equals viewport within units from GetRectAxis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.OffsetPixelY
member.summary: Gets or sets currently zoomed vertical pixel offset within the logical coordinates defining virtual size/location of chart. The logical size/location of zoomed chart is retrieved with PeFunction.GetRectAxis. GetRectGraph defines size/location of viewport in screen coordinates which equals viewport within units from GetRectAxis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.OffsetX
member.summary: Gets or sets currently zoomed horizontal percent offset within the logical coordinates defining virtual size/location of chart. Equal to PixelOffsetX / PeFunction.GetRectAxis.Width. Mostly used to store and then later restore a current zoom state. In which case all zoom properties should be stored/restored, WorkingFactor, OffsetPixelX/Y and OffsetX/Y.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphZoomGridItems.OffsetY
member.summary: Gets or sets currently zoomed vertical percent offset within the logical coordinates defining virtual size/location of chart. Equal to PixelOffsetY / PeFunction.GetRectAxis.Height. Mostly used to store and then later restore a current zoom state. In which case all zoom properties should be stored/restored, WorkingFactor, OffsetPixelX/Y and OffsetX/Y.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BoundaryGridItems.Types
member.summary: Gets and Sets visibility of upper and/or lower y axis regions.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BoundaryGridItems.UpperValue
member.summary: Gets and Sets upper boundary location if Grid.Boundary.Types enables upper boundary.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BoundaryGridItems.LowerValue
member.summary: Gets and Sets lower boundary location if Grid.Boundary.Types enables lower boundary.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BoundaryGridItems.UpperText
member.summary: Gets and Sets upper boundary title if Grid.Boundary.Types enables upper boundary.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BoundaryGridItems.LowerText
member.summary: Gets and Sets lower boundary title if Grid.Boundary.Types enables lower boundary.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.OptionGridItems.ShowYAxis
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether y axis grid lines, numbers, and labels are visible.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.OptionGridItems.YAxisLongTicks
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether y axis minor tick marks extend across chart as major grid lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.OptionGridItems.CustomGridNumbersY
member.summary: Set this property to True to enable event driven left y axis grid number formatting via CustomGridNumber event. Within the CustomGridNumber event, the developer can set the e.NumberString argument which controls the text for the grid line.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.OptionGridItems.TickStyle
member.summary: Gets and Sets the grid minor tick mark style when Grid.Option.YAxisLongTicks is True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.OptionGridItems.ScaleSymbols
member.summary: ProEssentials v4 has new scaling logic that places symbols within the Grid Numbers to help preserve real-estate when displaying large or small numbers. These symbols are defined with this property and default to: "p n u m K M B T ". These symbols are only used if Data.AutoScaleData = True. Note spaces between symbols if setting this property. For example, you can change this property to "p n u m K M G T " if you preferred 'G'iga over 'B'illion.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ForceGridLinesX
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether x axis grid lines are forced visible or hidden. Mostly used to improve overlapped axis configurations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ForceGridLinesY
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether y axis grid lines are forced visible or hidden. Mostly used to improve overlapped axis configurations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ForceGridLinesRY
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether right y axis grid lines are forced visible or hidden. Mostly used to improve overlapped axis configurations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.LogScaleExpLabels
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether log scales show grid numbers in scientific notation or normal numeric.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.VertOrient90Degrees
member.summary: Gets or Sets the orientation of vertical point labels and vertical x axis grid numbers. True = 90 degrees, False = 270 degrees.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ForceRightYAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether y axis is duplicated/mirrored on the opposite side of grid.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.YAxisOnRight
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether y axis is on left or right side of chart. True=right, False=left. If both left and right axes are present, this property reverses their location. This property applies to all y axes in a multi y axes implementation.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ShowRYAxis
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether right y axis grid lines, numbers, and labels are visible.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ShowXAxis
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether x axis grid lines, numbers, and labels are visible.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.InvertedYAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether y axis is vertically reversed in polarity. Subset data must be multiplied by (-1) when passed into the chart to achieve the desired effect.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.InvertedRYAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether right y axis is vertically reversed in polarity. Subset data must be multiplied by (-1) when passed into the chart to achieve the desired effect.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.RYAxisLongTicks
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether right y axis minor tick marks extend across chart as major grid lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.MultiAxesSeparators
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether grouped multiple y axes are separated in varying fashions. Only use this feature when Grid.Option.MultiAxisStyle is Grouped.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisFormatY
member.summary: Gets or Sets a format string used to format y axis grid numbers. {PRE-TEXT}|{.}{,}{0000}|{POST-TEXT} Where all items are optional except pipe symbols, and one or more zeros can be provided in middle section.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisFormatRY
member.summary: Gets or Sets a format string used to format right y axis grid numbers. {PRE-TEXT}|{.}{,}{0000}|{POST-TEXT} Where all items are optional except pipe symbols, and one or more zeros can be provided in middle section.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisNumericFormatY
member.summary: Controls numerical format of Y Axis. For Pego and Pesgo controls, set WorkingAxis prior to getting/setting this property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisNumericFormatRY
member.summary: Controls numerical format of right Y Axis. For Pego and Pesgo controls, set WorkingAxis prior to getting/setting this property.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.SpecialScalingY
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether y axis grid numbers are formatted as fractional numbers or decimals.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.SpecialScalingRY
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether right y axis grid numbers are formatted as fractional numbers or decimals.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.LogTickThreshold
member.summary: If a log scale’s range goes beyond the number of cycles defined by this property, log scale tick marks are shortened rather than extended across the graph. Default is 7 cycles.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.CustomGridNumbersRY
member.summary: Set this property to True to enable event driven right y axis grid number formatting via CustomGridNumber event. Within the CustomGridNumber event, the developer can set the e.NumberString argument which controls the text for the grid line.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.MultiAxisSeparatorSize
member.summary: This property controls the height of the section/gap produced by Grid.Option.MultiAxisStyle = SeparateAxes. Units are logical and are 1/100th of the size of the x axis label height. For example, a value of 100 produces an axis gap equal to the x axis label height, 200 produces an axis gap twice the distance of the x axis label height.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.MultiAxisStyle
member.summary: This property determines if multiple axes will be stacked or separated. The size of the separation may be adjusted with Grid.Option.MultiAxisSeparatorSize. Legends may also be inserted between axes using Legend.Style.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisSizeY
member.summary: This property can be used to reduce the chartable height of the left y axis. Because the axis no longer consumes the entire possible axis height, Grid.Option.AxisLocationY is used to control where the resulting axis is located. Values range from 20 to 100 representing 20% to 100%.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisLocationY
member.summary: This property controls axis location when Grid.Option.AxisSizeY is used to force a smaller charting left y axis height. Units are 0 to (100 - AxisSizeY).

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisSizeRY
member.summary: This property can be used to reduce the chartable height of the right y axis. Because the axis no longer consumes the entire possible axis height, Grid.Option.AxisLocationRY is used to control where the resulting axis is located. Values range from 20 to 100 representing 20% to 100%.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisLocationRY
member.summary: This property controls axis location when Grid.Option.AxisSizeRY is used to force a smaller charting right y axis height. Units are 0 to (100 - AxisSizeRY).

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.YearMonthDayPrompt
member.summary: Gets and Sets the year-month-day prompt format when Data.DateTimeMode = True. This prompt generally communicates the time span of the x axis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.YearMonthDayStyle
member.summary: Gets and Sets the order of year, month, day witin bottom-left and top-axis date prompts when DateTimeMode = True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.TimeLabelType
member.summary: Gets and Sets the time label grid line format when Data.DateTimeMode = True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.DayLabelType
member.summary: Gets and Sets the day label grid line format when Data.DateTimeMode = True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.MonthLabelType
member.summary: Gets and Sets the month label grid line format when Data.DateTimeMode = True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.YearLabelType
member.summary: Gets and Sets the year label grid line format when Data.DateTimeMode = True.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.VgnAxisLabelLocation
member.summary: This property is only used when Grid.Option.YAxisVertGridNumbers is True. Set to True to place axis labels at top of axis in replacement of grid numbers near top of axis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.YAxisVertGridNumbers
member.summary: Set to True to draw Y axis grid numbers vertical rather than horizontal. See also, Grid.Option.VgnAxisLabelLocation.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.DayLightSavings
member.summary: This property controls whether date/time x axis scales account for day light savings. Set to True for x axis to spring forward an hour in spring and fall backward an hour in fall. See also: Function.SetSpringDayLight, Function.SetFallDayLight

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTickMarkY
member.summary: Gets and Sets the style of tick marks for y axis. Establish Grid.WorkingAxis before setting this property if working with multiple y axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTickMarkRY
member.summary: Gets and Sets the style of tick marks for right y axis. Establish Grid.WorkingAxis before setting this property if working with multiple y axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTickMarkX
member.summary: Gets and Sets the style of tick marks for x axis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.GridAspect
member.summary: Gets and Sets the fixed grid aspect ratio (width over height). Set to 1.0 to produce a square grid. Set to zero to create a grid at maximum size.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisNumberSpacing
member.summary: This property allows developer to tweak the amount of space between y axis grid numbers and corresponding y axis label. For example, setting to .25 will shrink the gap whereas 1.25 will increase the gap. Default is .75. Units are pecentage of the axis label width.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisTickSpacing
member.summary: This property allows developer to tweak the amount of space between y axis grid numbers and corresponding y axis tick marks. Default is .25, for example, increasing to .5 will widen the gap. Units are pecentage of the axis label width.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisNumberSpacingX
member.summary: This property allows developer to tweak the amount of space between x axis grid numbers/pointlablels and corresponding x axis labels. Default is 0, for example, setting to 0.5 will widen this gap, setting to -0.5 will shrink the gap.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.AxisTickSpacingX
member.summary: This property allows developer to tweak the amount of space between x axis grid numbers/pointlablels and corresponding x axis tick marks. Default is 0.25, for example, setting to 0.5 will widen this gap.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphOptionGridItems.ClipAxesInMetafiles
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether gdi commands are clipped to an axis by truncating gdi coordinates to axis border. It hides the graphics behind the section between axes so this works best with MultiAxisStyle set to 1. Metafiles do not directly support clipping so this feature attempts to work around this limitation. Good when you need to export metafiles and want to preserve clipping.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphOptionGridItems.ForceGridLinesTX
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether top x axis grid lines are forced visible or hidden. Mostly used to improve overlapped axis configurations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphOptionGridItems.XAxisVertNumbering
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether x axis grid numbers are vertical. See also Grid.Option.VertOrient90Degrees.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphOptionGridItems.ForceTopXAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether x axis is duplicated/mirrored on the opposite side of grid.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphOptionGridItems.XAxisOnTop
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether x axis is on bottom or top side of chart. True=top, False=bottom. If both bottom and top axes are present, this property reverses their location.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTXAxis
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the top x axis grid lines, numbers, and labels are visible.

member.summary: Gets or Sets whether x axis is horziontally reversed in polarity. Subset data must be multiplied by (-1) when passed into the chart to achieve the desired effect.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphOptionGridItems.InvertedTXAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether top x axis is horziontally reversed in polarity. Subset data must be multiplied by (-1) when passed into the chart to achieve the desired effect.

member.summary: Gets or Sets whether top x axis minor tick marks extend across chart as major grid lines.

member.summary: Gets or Sets a format string used to format top x axis grid numbers. {PRE-TEXT}|{.}{,}{0000}|{POST-TEXT} Where all items are optional except pipe symbols, and one or more zeros can be provided in middle section.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphOptionGridItems.GridAspectX
member.summary: Allows control of size/shape of 3d charting volume. Controls size of x axis as relates to z axis. Default 1.0 For example, set to .5 if the x axis length should be half that of z.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphOptionGridItems.GridAspectY
member.summary: Allows control of size/shape of 3d charting volume. Controls size of y axis as relates to z axis. Default 1.0 For example, set to .5 if the x axis length should be half that of z.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphOptionGridItems.GridAspectZ
member.summary: Allows control of size/shape of 3d charting volume. Controls size of z axis as relates to x axis. Default 1.0 For example, set to .5 if the z axis length should be half that of x.

member.summary: Controls numerical format of radius Axis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.AxisNumericFormatRY
member.summary: Controls numerical format of secondary radius Axis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.ShowXAxis
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether degree grid lines, numbers are visible.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.ShowPolarGrid
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the Smith scales will also show major polar grid lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.SmartSmithGrid
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether R and X rings converge into r = infinity, making the chart more readable.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.InvertedXAxis
member.summary: Gets or Sets the direction in which degrees increase. If False (default) the degrees increase counter-clock-wise. Else if True, degrees increase clock-wise.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.XAxisLongTicks
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether degree minor tick marks extend across chart as major grid lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.CustomGridNumbersX
member.summary: Set this property to True to enable event driven degree grid number formatting via CustomGridNumber event. Within the CustomGridNumber event, the developer can set the e.NumberString argument which controls the text for the grid line. Note you also can change degree number text by setting Strings.PointLabels.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.CustomGridNumbersRY
member.summary: Set this property to True to enable event driven right y axis grid number formatting via CustomGridNumber event. Within the CustomGridNumber event, the developer can set the e.NumberString argument which controls the text for the grid line.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTickMarkY
member.summary: Gets and Sets the style of tick marks for y axis. Establish Grid.WorkingAxis before setting this property if working with multiple y axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTickMarkRY
member.summary: Gets and Sets the style of tick marks for right y axis. Establish Grid.WorkingAxis before setting this property if working with multiple y axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.ShowTickMarkX
member.summary: Gets and Sets the style of tick marks for x axis.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphOptionGridItems.PolarScaleAlternative
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether negative polar data is plotted offset by 180 degrees or approaches center of chart.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.ManualScaleControlY
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the y axis's extents are automatically configured or manually configured via ManualMinY and ManualMaxY.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.ManualMinY
member.summary: Gets and Sets the y axis minimum value. Setting this value also depends on setting ManualScaleControlY.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.ManualMaxY
member.summary: Gets and Sets the y axis maximum value. Setting this value also depends on setting ManualScaleControlY.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.ManualYAxisTicknLine
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether y axis grid line frequency is automatically set or manually configured with ManualYAxisLine and ManualYAxisTick.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.ManualYAxisLine
member.summary: Gets and Sets the y axis grid line frequency. Setting this value also depends on setting ManualYAxisTicknLine and ManualYAxisTick.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.ManualYAxisTick
member.summary: Gets and Sets the y axis tick frequency. Setting this value also depends on setting ManualYAxisTicknLine and ManualYAxisLine.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.AutoMinMaxPadding
member.summary: This property represents the percentage added above and below the automatically determined range for an axis when Grid.Configure.ManualScaleControlY and similar properties are set to None(automatic). This property sets all other similar AutoMinMaxPadding properties.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.GridLineMultiples
member.summary: Setting this property to FALSE will remove the limitation that grid line numbers must be multiples of 2, 5, and 10. Normally not needed unless you are using Grid.Configure.ManualYAxisTicknLine or related property and having trouble setting certain grid line and tick frequencies.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ConfigureGridItems.YAxisWholeNumbers
member.summary: If true, y axis major grid lines will only be located at whole numbers.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphConfigureGridItems.AutoMinMaxPaddingY
member.summary: This property represents the percentage added above and below the automatically determined range for Y axis when Grid.Configure.ManualScaleControlY is set to None(automatic). Current state of WorkingAxis controls the respective axis modified.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphConfigureGridItems.AutoMinMaxPaddingRY
member.summary: This property represents the percentage added above and below the automatically determined range for right Y axis when Grid.Configure.ManualScaleControlRY is set to None(automatic). Current state of WorkingAxis controls the respective axis modified.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphConfigureGridItems.AutoPadBeyondZeroY
member.summary: Setting True allows AutoMinMaxPaddingY to set min-max values which potentially cross zero origin when padding axis with extra space. Current state of WorkingAxis controls the respective axis modified.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BaseGraphConfigureGridItems.AutoPadBeyondZeroRY

member.summary: Gets and Sets meaningful frequencies to place point labels and tabled data. If the points being charted is larger than Grid.Configure.AltFreqThreshold then a frequency will be automatically selected to produce a quantity of grid lines closest to Grid.Configure.TargetPointsToTable.

member.summary: Gets and Sets the quantity of point labels which will be attempted to be displayed when Data.Points and/or UI.Scrollbar.PointsToGraph is greater than or equal to Grid.Configure.AltFreqThreshold.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphConfigureGridItems.AltFreqThreshold

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphConfigureGridItems.PolarTickThreshold
member.summary: Use with Grid.Configure.PolarLineThreshold, and Grid.Configure.Polar30DegreeThreshold to create a custom grid. This property manually sets how far degree tick marks extend from the outer rim of polar chart inward. The value defined is measured with respect to the magnitude axis (Yaxis). Must also use Grid.Option.XAxisLongTicks and Grid.Option.YAxisLongTicks. Also, use Grid.Configure.ManualScaleControlY if the data set does not include zero as the origin. The threshold will be offset by Grid.Configure.ManualMinY. See Example 205 in demo.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphConfigureGridItems.PolarLineThreshold
member.summary: Use with Grid.Configure.PolarTickThreshold, and Grid.Configure.Polar30DegreeThreshold to create a custom grid. This property manually sets how far degree grid lines extend from the outer rim of polar chart inward. The value defined is measured with respect to the magnitude axis (Yaxis). Must also use Grid.Option.XAxisLongTicks and Grid.Option.YAxisLongTicks. Also, use Grid.Configure.ManualScaleControlY if the data set does not include zero as the origin. The threshold will be offset by Grid.Configure.ManualMinY. See Example 205 in demo.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphConfigureGridItems.Polar30DegreeThreshold
member.summary: Use with Grid.Configure.PolarTickThreshold, and Grid.Configure.PolarLineThreshold to create a custom grid. This property manually sets how far 30 degree grid lines extend from the outer rim of polar chart inward. The value defined is measured with respect to the magnitude axis (Yaxis). Must also use Grid.Option.XAxisLongTicks and Grid.Option.YAxisLongTicks. Also, use Grid.Configure.ManualScaleControlY if the data set does not include zero as the origin. The threshold will be offset by Grid.Configure.ManualMinY. See Example 205 in demo.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphConfigureGridItems.ZeroDegreeOffset
member.summary: Gets and Sets the location of zero degrees. By default it is at 3 o’clock. Setting this property to 90 will position 0 degrees at 12 o’clock. Setting this property to –90 will position 0 degrees as 6 o’clock.
