member.summary: If setting this property, set it before passing data. Gets and Sets whether single or double precision data is utilized. Set to true to use double precision (Data.Yii) instead of (Data.Y).

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.AppendFromURL(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves and-or appends a portion of data from szURL which points to an Aspx page with a ProEssentials Pedo Webform control.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.AppendFromURL(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves and-or appends a portion of data from szURL which points to an Aspx page with a ProEssentials Pedo Webform control. dwFlags represents internet session flag, example: INTERNET_FLAG_RELOAD.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.Subsets
member.summary: Read to learn the quantity of X, Y, Z, PointLabels, and PointColors data.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.Points
member.summary: Read to learn the quantity of X, Y, Z, PointLabels, and PointColors data.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.SubsetByPoint
member.summary: Rarely used property, read to learn how two dimensional properties are stored in memory, subset-by-point or point-by-subset.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.DisableAppend
member.summary: Usually set server-side on the Pedo WebForm control. Read to learn server setting. Mostly used internally to control if AppendFromURL appends new data to existing data.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.X
member.summary: Single precision X-Data or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of data can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.Xii
member.summary: Double precision X-Data or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of data can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.Y
member.summary: Single precision Z-Data or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of data can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.Yii
member.summary: Double precision Y-Data or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of data can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.summary: Single precision Z-Data or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of data can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.summary: Double precision Z-Data or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of data can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.PointLabels
member.summary: PointLabels or optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.PointColors

For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control. The quantity of PointColors can be learned from Pedo.Subsets and Pedo.Points.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.ExtraStringData
member.summary: Optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.ExtraDoubleData
member.summary: Optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PedoDataItems.ExtraIntData
member.summary: Optional developer defined data to read after an AppendFromURL function call. For pure data transfers without appending logic, set DisableAppend to TRUE server side within the Pedo Webform control.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.LegendItems.SubsetColors
member.summary: Gets or Sets color associated with zero based subset indice.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.LegendItems.Location
member.summary: Gets or Sets the location of the legend. See also Legend.Style.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.LegendItems.Style
member.summary: Gets or Sets the legend style. Controls whether legend symbol and text are on a single line, or legend symbol and text are above and below. If using the Pego or Pesgo objects, legends may additionally be placed inside the axis, or when using Grid.Option.MultiAxisStle = SeparateAxes, in between axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.LegendItems.SimplePoint
member.summary: Gets and Sets point symbol style within legend. Set to false to draw point symbols with a bounding box filled with graph background color, set to true to draw symbols in actual form as plotted in chart.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.LegendItems.SimpleLine
member.summary: Gets and Sets line symbol style within legend. Set to false to draw line symbols in a magnified fashion and set to true to draw symbols in actual size.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.LegendItems.OneLinePerLegend
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether legends force one subset legend per line when PeLegend.Style is set to OneLine. V6 now supports longer subset labels so this property visually helps when one subset has an extra long label and other subsets have shorter labels.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.SubsetsToLegend
member.summary: Gets or Sets zero based subset indices which will be included in legend. Also used to alter the order of subsets shown in the legend. Setting SubsetsToLegend(0)=-1 removes legend. Setting SubsetsToLegend(-1)=0 empties this array.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.SubsetLineTypes
member.summary: Gets or Sets line styles associated with zero based subset indice.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.SubsetPointTypes
member.summary: Gets or Sets point styles assocated with zero based subset indice.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.AnnotationType
member.summary: Gets or Sets legend annotation type. Set to a value defined in ProEssentials.Enums.LegendAnnotationType. Annotations.Show must be true to see legend annotations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.AnnotationText
member.summary: Gets or Sets legend annotation text. Annotations.Show must be true to see legend annotations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.AnnotationColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets legend annotation color. Annotations.Show must be true to see legend annotations.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.BGLegendItems.Show
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the legend is visible.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.GraphLegendItems.AnnotationAxis
member.summary: Only used in an implementation with multiple y axes. Gets or Sets legend annotation axis (values 0 through 5 cooresponding to axis index).

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphLegendItems.AnnotationAxis
member.summary: Only used in an implementation with multiple y axes. Gets or Sets legend annotation axis (values 0 through 5 cooresponding to axis index).

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphLegendItems.ContourLegendPrecision
member.summary: Controls an optional maximum precision (number of decimal places) used within legends when the PlottingMethod is ColoredContour.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.SGraphLegendItems.ContourStyle
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the legend shows a contour. Generally set this property to true if setting Plot.Method to ContourColors. Contour style legends can only be at the left or right Legend.Location.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphLegendItems.ContourLegendPrecision
member.summary: Controls an optional maximum precision (number of decimal places) used within legends when the PlottingMethod is ColoredContour.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphLegendItems.ContourStyle
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the legend shows a contour. Generally set this property to true if setting Plot.Method to ContourColors. Contour style legends can only be at the left or right Legend.Location.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphLegendItems.ShowContourLegends
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether the legend shows a contour. Generally set this property to true if setting Plot.Method to ContourColors. Contour style legends can only be at the left or right Legend.Location.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.ThreeDGraphLegendItems.Style
member.summary: Gets or Sets the legend style. Controls whether legend symbol and text are on a single line, or legend symbol and text are above and below. If using the Pego or Pesgo objects, legends may additionally be placed inside the axis, or when using Grid.Option.MultiAxisStle = SeparateAxes, in between axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PSGraphLegendItems.Style
member.summary: Gets or Sets the legend style. Controls whether legend symbol and text are on a single line, or legend symbol and text are above and below. If using the Pego or Pesgo objects, legends may additionally be placed inside the axis, or when using Grid.Option.MultiAxisStle = SeparateAxes, in between axes.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PCLegendItems.ShowPieLegend
member.summary: Gets and Sets whether a legend is visible.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color of the table's bounding box and text within box.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets color used as the background color for the chart's table.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.Font
member.summary: Gets or Sets font for Table when GraphPlusTable is non zero.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.Show
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether a table is included below chart.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.What
member.summary: If RandomSubsetsToGraph controls which subsets are visible, this property controls if all subsets are still tabled.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.ComparisonSubsets
member.summary: Rarely needed, normally the Graph Object’s table will not include subsets which have identical data. Setting this property to TRUE will force all subsets to be tabled.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.Format
member.summary: This property controls whether tabled items will be formatted via Grid.Option.AxisFormatY and Grid.Option.AxisFormatRY.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.Allow
member.summary: Gets or Sets ability of user to show the table below graph.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.SubsetsToTable
member.summary: Controls order and visibility of subsets within the table. Fill this array with zero based subset indices of those subsets you wish to include in the table.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.GridLines
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether table includes grid lines.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.FontBold
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether table font is bold.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.FontItalic
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether table font is italic.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.TableItems.FontUnderline
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether table font is underlined.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.Finalize
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.Font
member.summary: Sets multiple font characteristics. Individual font characteristics can be controlled via the ProEssentials.Fonts namespace. This property only contols Name, Bold, Italic, Underline, and GDICharSet members. FontSize is controlled programmatically with ProEssentials.Fonts.FontSize.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.Cursor
member.summary: Gets and Sets the main cursor for chart. Performs a simular function as UserInterface.Cursor.Arrow.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.Text
member.summary: Gets and Sets the main title for chart. Performs a simular function as Strings.MainTitle.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.BackColor
member.summary: Gets and Sets the background color for control. Performs a simular function as Color.Desk.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets and Sets the foreground color for control. Performs a simular function as Color.Text.

member.name: P:Gigasoft.ProEssentials.PEBase.BackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets and Sets the Image used as background for control. Performs a simular function as Color.DeskBackgroundImage and/or Color.DeskBmpFilename. Only enabled if Color.BitmapGradientMode = true, Color.Desk = 1, and Color.DeskBmpStyle is non-zero.
